title: Introduction to Web Development
description: Learn the basics of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build your first website.

lesson.title: HTML Basics
lesson.description: Understand the structure of web pages using HTML.

lesson.title: CSS Essentials
lesson.description: Learn how to style web pages using CSS.

title: Advanced JavaScript
description: Deep dive into JavaScript with ES6, asynchronous programming, and advanced concepts.

lesson.title: ES6 and Beyond
lesson.description: Explore modern JavaScript features introduced in ES6.

lesson.title: Asynchronous Programming
lesson.description: Learn about promises, async/await, and event loops.

title: Python for Beginners
description: Start programming with Python, one of the most beginner-friendly languages.

lesson.title: Introduction to Python
lesson.description: Learn Python syntax, variables, and basic concepts.

lesson.title: Control Flow in Python
lesson.description: Understand how to use loops and conditionals.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms
description: Understand the fundamentals of data structures and algorithms for efficient problem-solving.

lesson.title: Introduction to Algorithms
lesson.description: Learn what algorithms are and how they are analyzed.

lesson.title: Sorting Algorithms
lesson.description: Explore common sorting algorithms like quicksort and mergesort.

title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Learn the fundamentals of machine learning and how to build simple models.

lesson.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
lesson.description: Understand the basics of supervised and unsupervised learning.

lesson.title: Linear Regression
lesson.description: Learn how to implement linear regression models.

title: React for Beginners
description: Build dynamic and interactive user interfaces with React.js.

lesson.title: React Components
lesson.description: Learn how to build and use components in React.

lesson.title: State and Props
lesson.description: Understand how state and props work in React applications.

title: Introduction to Databases
description: Learn how to work with databases using SQL.

lesson.title: SQL Basics
lesson.description: Learn how to create, read, update, and delete data using SQL.

lesson.title: Database Design
lesson.description: Understand how to design efficient databases.

title: Cloud Computing Essentials
description: Understand the basics of cloud computing and its applications.

lesson.title: Introduction to Cloud Computing
lesson.description: Learn what cloud computing is and its benefits.
